name: useCookie
description: Custom hook that manages state synchronized with a browser [`cookie`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Cookies). It handles serialization, prefixes, updates across tabs, and custom event synchronization.

props.name: key
props.description: The base name of the cookie.

props.name: initialValue
props.description: The initial value of the state.

schema.name: defaultValue
schema.description: The default value to return if the cookie is not found.

schema.name: deserializer
schema.description: A function to deserialize the stored value.

schema.name: domain
schema.description: The domain for which the cookie is valid.

schema.name: expires
schema.description: The expiration date of the cookie.

schema.name: initializeWithValue
schema.description: If `true` (default), the hook will initialize reading the cookie.

schema.name: maxAge
schema.description: The maximum age of the cookie in seconds.

schema.name: path
schema.description: The path within the site for which the cookie is valid.

schema.name: prefix
schema.description: A prefix to be prepended to the key (e.g., "myApp_"). Useful for namespacing or complying with cookie prefixes like `__Secure-` or `__Host-`.

schema.name: sameSite
schema.description: Controls whether the cookie is sent with cross-site requests.

schema.name: secure
schema.description: If `true`, the cookie is only transmitted over secure protocols (HTTPS).

schema.name: serializer
schema.description: A function to serialize the value before storing it.
